Welcome to the Response Buddy browser extension!

🚀 Extension Features
📋 Manage with Ease
Craft, tweak, and sort responses effortlessly.
Dive deep with categorized responses for streamlined access.

📋 Clipboard Magic
A single click on a heading button in the extension's popup, and voila! Your response is clipboard-ready.

📋 Bulk Brilliance
Juggle multiple responses like a pro—add, export, or delete in batches.

📋 Swift Search & Tooltips
Quick-find responses by headings or categories.
Hover over a heading button for a second to unveil its associated response through a handy tooltip.

🎮 Usage
🔍 Access Galore
Click the Response Buddy icon in your browser toolbar for a peek into the extension's magic.

📝 Crafting New Responses
Dive into "Manage Responses," tap "Add New," fill in the response essentials, and watch it join the elite saved responses.

🌐 Manage in Bulk
Use the “Process and Save Multiple Responses” feature. Input responses in the format: <<Heading>> Response <<Heading>> Response … and hit save!

🖋 Edit & Export
Edit on the fly or bulk export selected gems for later use.

🔒 Security & Privacy
🛡 Your Data, Your Sanctuary
We're fiercely protective of your privacy. No PII harvesting here!
Everything happens locally on your device. No sneaky data transmissions to third-party servers.

🚫 No Cookies, No Tracking
No cookies. No tracking. Just pure, unadulterated functionality.

🛠 Installation
1. Browser Compatibility
Response Buddy shines on Google Chrome and other Chromium-based browsers that cherish Chrome extensions.

2. Quick Installation Steps:
Head over to the Chrome Web Store and Search for "Response Buddy."
Hit "Add to Chrome" or "Install."
Voila! Spot the Response Buddy icon on your toolbar, signalling it's game time.
Opt for “Pin to toolbar” for quick access.
